text:
Need Daniel Martinez for Portmans campaign. Budget around $4,754, looking for 1 x Instagram story, 3 x Radio interview, 2 x Instagram story, 3 x Media interview. 12 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs November 2025. Usage rights for 8 months. Engagement period: 5 months. Additional notes: TBC on exact dates, around $4,754 budget

Need to confirm: deliverables
